title: University of Nevada, Reno PR Request 2

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Nevada Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

- All financial documents showing UNR expenditures on PR, communications, and marketing over the last five years
- Names, titles, salaries, and job descriptions for all PR, communications, and marketing employees of UNR over the last three years

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Kelsea Frobes

title: University of Nevada, Reno External Public Relations

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Nevada Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

- All account statements, invoices, and financial records for external PR and marketing services for UNR (including all departments and employees) over the last five years
- All contracts between UNR (including all departments and employees) and external PR firms/consultants over the last five years
- All documents detailing PR services contracted by UNR (including all departments and employees) to external providers of media, communications, PR, marketing, media coaching/training over the last five years

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Kelsea Frobes
